justification: "Each pair … participants were asked to provide a rating on a 12-point scale ranging from 1 (Sure Different) to 12 (Sure Same)."

measured_by: 6-point confidence rating collapsed from the 12-point scale
justification: "We measured people's absolute confidence on each trial by first collapsing across same and different on our 12-point scale … so each rating ranged from 1 (Unsure) to 6 (Sure)."

measured_by: Self-reported years of formal fingerprint experience
justification: "At the beginning of the experiment, each participant was asked to indicate how many years of formal experience they have with fingerprints."
